title: Sharing an Honest Opinion
description: Kevin talks about sharing his opinion at work and the impact it had.
speaker: Kevin
text: A few months ago, I was part of a group working on a new idea at work.
Everyone seemed excited, but I had some concerns about the plan.
At first, I stayed quiet because I did not want to cause problems or disagree with others.
However, as the discussion continued, I realized that my opinion could be helpful.
When it was my turn to speak, I calmly explained my concerns and suggested a few improvements.
Some people were surprised, but they listened carefully.
After the meeting, several colleagues thanked me for being honest.
The final plan was improved, and I felt more confident sharing my ideas in the future.
This experience taught me that respectful communication can lead to better results.

questions.question: Why did Kevin stay quiet at first?
options: He did not care about the idea
He did not want to disagree with others
He did not understand the plan
He was late to the meeting
questions.correctAnswer: He did not want to disagree with others

questions.question: What made Kevin decide to speak?
options: He realized his opinion could help
questions.correctAnswer: He realized his opinion could help
